titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on camel hair, processed beyond the degreased or carbonized condition.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/12/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on camel hair, processed beyond the degreased or carbonized condition.
